author: Jiang Wanjuan
title: Beijing Capital among the world's best airports, says Skytrax
text: More news, analysis and features at China Watch Skytrax has published its latest annual World Airport Awards. Singapore's Changi International Airport took the crown as the world's best airport, and Beijing stood 10th overall. It was the third year running for Singapore's Changi International Airport to be named World's Best Airport by Skytrax, the London-based aviation website and global source of airline ratings and reviews. Singapore's Changi International Airport is the world's best airport (Photo: IC) Singapore Changi Airport connects customers to more than 200 destinations worldwide, with 5,000 arrivals and departures a week by 80 international airlines, according to Skytrax. The main international airport serving Beijing and the second-busiest airport in the world from 2014, Beijing Capital International Airport remained in the list's top 10, while standing at seventh last year. Fifth-placed Tokyo International Airport, commonly known as Haneda Airport (Picture: IC) It's worth mentioning that the first 10 spots were divided equally between Asia and Europe, and none of the airports in North America made it into the top 10. Vancouver International Airport, ranked 11, is the best in North America, according to Skytrax. The World Airport Awards began in 1999, and has become a global benchmark of airport excellence. Hong Kong International Airport, which came fourth (Picture: IC) The 2015 World Airport Awards are based on 13 million survey questionnaires completed by airline customers around the world. The survey covered 550 airports worldwide, and evaluated travellers' experiences from check-in, arrivals, transfers, shopping, security and immigration through to departure at the gate. Germany’s Munich Airport was third on Skytrax's list (Picture: IC) The following are the best 20 airports in 2015, according to Skytrax. Singapore Changi Incheon International Airport, South Korea Munich Airport, Germany Hong Kong International Tokyo International Haneda, Japan Zurich Airport, Switzerland Central Japan International London Heathrow, UK Amsterdam Schiphol, The Netherlands Beijing Capital, China Vancouver International Airport, Canada Kansai International Airport, Japan Frankfurt Airport, Germany Narita International Airport, Japan Auckland International Airport, New Zealand Copenhagen Airport, Denmark Taiwan Taoyuan Helsinki-Vantaa, Finland Kuala Lumpur International, Malaysia Brisbane Airport, Australia At number 11, Vancouver International Airport is 'the best in North America' (Picture: IC) This article was originally produced and published by China Daily .
